WOlfblade::

She glanced and walked back, three or four steps back to the lab. She 
saw Elita and Nightlight. She lowered her optics and shook her head. 
"Good grief." She looked at Malice. "Yo, You up for a mug of hot 
energon or what? Bet I can out drink you in EnerGIN anytime. That is 
some stuff that will make your systems think it entered the middle of 
a phasic meltdown. heh heh heh."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice turned to see Nightlight standing with Elita.
> "I think he went and followed Camoflage to her quarters I think.  
Come to think of it, I need to apologize to Camo anyway." 
> He stood up straight, turned to face the one he addressed, and 
leaned against one elbow on the sphere.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nighlight/elita::
> 
> nighlight arrives with elita, the litle child was calming down and 
> now was sleeping. When she saw Malice and Kitkat she said "Hi!! 
Have 
> you seen Kup???? "
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Malice heard her and rolled the heavy thing into the lab.  It was 
> almost as tall as she was.
> > "One basalt sphere, ready for final manufacture, after I take a 
> nap and have a meal of energon." 
> > He said the latter part sarcastically, for he was quite tired.  
He 
> was leaning against his handwork, trying to keep his optics open 
and 
> his knees unlocked.
> > 
> > shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > Wolfblade::
> > 
> > She had gone to the lab and worked on the magnet as soon as 
Malice 
> > had left the base. She was putting the finishing touches on it as 
> she 
> > heard her name being called out. "I'm here in Lab number 5."
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > Malice nodded and transformed into his beast mode.  He wanders 
> > outside of the base, searching for lava tubes or something.  
After 
> > about a megacycle of wandering and searching, he finally found a 
> > basalt based lava flow and transformed.  He wadded about knee 
deep 
> > and absorbed the heat so he would not melt or warp his legs.  He 
> got 
> > a hand full of the heavy thick stuff, and drew the heat out, 
> leaving 
> > a solid mass.  He then dipped it into the lava, pulled it out, 
and 
> > repeated the process until it was halfway up his chest after 
> several 
> > megacycles.  He rolled it out of the lava stream and began to 
roll 
> it 
> > back to the base.
> > >  
> > >  
> > > Two megacycles later, Malice finally rolled the crude sphere 
> like 
> > ball into the base.  He rolled it into the cargo bay, and went to 
> > find Wolfblade.
> > > "Hey Wolfblade, I finished the sphere!  Where are you?"  
> > > 
> >
